item.title: 🏆 IEEE Nagoya Section Excellent student Award
item.description: I received the IEEE Nagoya Section Excellent Student Award in recognition of my academic and research achievements during the master’s program. This award is granted to students with outstanding accomplishments, following a nomination by an IEEE member and a review by the Board of Directors and the Extended Executive Committee.

item.title: 🏆 Student Award (Academic Research Activities)
item.description:
On March 6, 2025, the Student Award (Academic Research Activities) ceremony was held at Toyohashi University of Technology to recognize individuals and groups who achieved outstanding academic and extracurricular accomplishments during the 2024 academic year.

I was honored to be one of the recipients, receiving an award in the individual category for academic research activities.

The ceremony was conducted in a solemn atmosphere, where award recipients were presented with certificates and commemorative gifts by President Wakahara.

item.title: 🏆 Excellent Presentation Award
item.description: At the 2025 Master’s Thesis Review Committee of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Toyohashi University of Technology, I presented “Dynamic Optimization of Raft Election Parameters Based on Network Quality,” which received the Excellent Presentation Award.

item.title: 🏆 Outstanding Presentation Award for Young Researchers
item.description: I was honored to receive the Outstanding Presentation Award for Young Researchers from the for my presentation, “A Proposal of Selection Guideline for Geographical SMR Protocols Using Communication Pattern-based Response Time Models,” at held at Hakodate Arena from August 2 to August 4, 2023. This award recognizes outstanding presentations by researchers under the age of 33 during conferences held between June 1 and May 31 of the following year.

item.title: 💵 Grant: JASSO Exchange Student Support Program
item.description: I studied at the Technical University of Munich through the for six months, from September 2024 to February 2025. During this exchange, I received a scholarship totaling 610,000 yen from the . This scholarship included a monthly stipend of 80,000 yen (for six months) and an additional 130,000 yen for travel expenses.

item.title: 🏆 Excellent Presentation Award
item.description: I received the Excellent Presentation Award for my presentation, “ネットワーク測定に基づくRaft選挙パラメータの動的最適化 (Dynamic Optimization of Raft Election Parameters Based on Network Measurements),” at the held at Nagoya Institute of Technology from September 1 to September 3, 2024.

item.title: 💵 Grant: Overseas Training Support for Graduate Students
item.description: I studied at the Technical University of Munich as part of the , from September 2024 to February 2025. item.title: 💵 Grant: Toyohashi University of Technology Overseas Trainee Scholarship
item.description: I participated in a training program in Malaysia through the at Toyohashi University of Technology from January 4 to February 25, 2023. I received a grant of 200,000 yen through the Toyohashi University of Technology Overseas Trainee Scholarship Program. This scholarship is awarded to a limited number of students based on their academic performance and interview results.
